news_header: A survey shows that 54% of Finns support replacing inheritance tax with property gain tax, with the highest support from voters of the Finns party (69%). Support is also notable among Christian Democrats (68%), Assembly (64%), and RKP (61%).
news_original_title: EVA: Hieman yli puolet suomalaisista korvaisi perintöveron luovutusvoittoverolla
news_text: The Centre Party has 54% support, while SDP has 49%. Less support comes from Greens (40%) and Left Alliance (28%). The government is considering this change, which would simplify property transfers and alleviate tax burdens on family assets.
